name: Carlton F. ANDERSON, pro se, Petitioner v. The COMMONWEALTH COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, et al., Respondent

parties: Carlton F. ANDERSON, pro se, Petitioner v. The COMMONWEALTH COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, et al., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the “Motion for Article IX Authentication” are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
40 A.3d 1231
Carlton F. ANDERSON, pro se, Petitioner v. The COMMONWEALTH COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, et al., Respondent.
No. 156 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 28, 2012.
